Articles.Content:
I don\'t know what my problem is, but every time I tried to get a cart to Minmus, something went wrong. from rockets exploding on the first stage to actually getting there and having the cart get stuck on the lander. Well, I\'ve finally made it. I landed a nice wide base, a lander and a pod with two full tanks of RCS for plenty of Minmus exploration fun. Even got a shot with Kerbin in the background. Now to EXPLORE!

Let\'s see if I can land the same thing on the Mun.
what mods you using?? would love to use a rover to explore!!!!

what mods you using?? would love to use a rover to explore!!!!

er... he\'s using mechjeb and tosh\'s cart mod

er... he\'s using mechjeb and tosh\'s cart mod

Indeed I am. Nothing more.
